item.title: Rob Liefeld’s ‘Youngblood’ No. 1 Passes $500,000 in Sales, New Edition Planned
item.description: After selling the book directly on his website, Image Comics will now release a mass market edition with covers from star artists Skottie Young, Daniel Warren Johnson, Ryan Stegman, Ryan Ottley, Kael
